subject: FW: Update Credit Limit Tibiel NGAS HENEX platform
text:
Fya

 

From: Athanasios Karantzis <akarantzis@tibiel.com>
Sent: Wednesday, October 2, 2024 1:28 PM
To: Loukopoulou Georgia <GLoukopoulou@eurobank.gr>
Cc: Stoyan Vasilev <s.vasilev@tibiel.com>; Backoffice <Backoffice@tibiel.com>; Gas Trade <Gastrade@tibiel.com>; Athanasios
Karantzis <akarantzis@tibiel.com>; Sales and Relationship Management <SalesandRelationshipManagement@eurobank.gr>; Palamidas
Andreas <anpalamidas@eurobank.gr>; Stavridou Soultana <SStavridou@eurobank.gr>; Kotsiou Eirini <EKotsiou@eurobank.gr>
Subject: Update Credit Limit Tibiel NGAS HENEX platform

 

CAUTION: This is an EXTERNAL Email. Please DO NOT open attachments, click links or reply, unless you have verified the sender and
know the content is safe.

ΠΡΟΣΟΧΗ: Το Email προέρχεται από ΕΞΩΤΕΡΙΚΗ ΠΗΓΗ. Παρακαλούμε ΜΗΝ απαντήσετε, MHN ανοίξετε attachments & MHN ακολουθήσετε links,
πριν βεβαιωθείτε οτι ο αποστολέας και το περιεχόμενο είναι ασφαλή.

 

Dear Georgia,

 

As per our phone conversation, we would like to update our credit limit on HENEX NGAS trading platform from 0 to 100 euro.

 

Please guide us regarding the process.

 

Best regards,

Thanasis

 

Athanasios Karantzis  

Head of Supply and Gas Trading  of TIBIEL EOOD in Greece
